channel.title: Midnight Movie Knights
channel.itunes:subtitle: Two Idiots With Microphones
channel.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
channel.itunes:summary: Two friends in different states with microphones that love watching movies together.
channel.description: Two friends in different states with microphones that love watching movies together.

item.title: 005 - Blades of Glory
item.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
item.itunes:subtitle: I think I Liked It!
item.itunes:summary: The Movie Knights are joined by one of their first supporters, a squire if you will. Lessons learned from NetHeads, prior podcasting experiences, The Lego Movie, bad drivers, and more! This week's Flick Pick is Blades of Glory.

item.title: 004 - Pump Up The Volume
item.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
item.itunes:subtitle: An Inspiration!
item.itunes:summary: Rage provocation, Invisibility, moonshine, remakes of iconic movies, and a smidge of Doctor Who. Pump up the Volume is the flick pick for the week, and one of the hosts can't believe that the other hasn't seen it.

item.title: 003 - Pirate Radio
item.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
item.itunes:subtitle: Cool Flick!
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk trailers, and the unfortunate death of Phillip Seymour Hoffman. Our "Flick Pick" was Pirate Radio which we watched before we recorded because the internet hates us.

item.title: 002 - Origin Stories
item.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
item.itunes:subtitle: Evolution of a Pod
item.itunes:summary: This week we went a little longer than our target of 30-45 minutes, but we wanted to properly thank everyone who listened last week as well as answer some of the questions we've received. We are still experimenting with the format, and we actually made attempts at learning to edit the audio.

item.title: 001 - Waxing Idiodical
item.itunes:author: @MirandaJanell & @ThatFrakkingCat
item.itunes:subtitle: Two friends waxing idiodically
item.itunes:summary: The first recording of two friends having a good time and it didn't totally suck, just mostly.
